messages.msgSnippet: Kelly, What are the working scholarships?  Interested.  Stepheny ... From: kbcdlovejo@aol.com To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com Sent: Saturday, August
messages.messageBody:
Kelly, What are the working scholarships? Interested. Stepheny

>

>
> Kelly has working scholarships.

> Joyce
>

Yep, yep, yep!

~Kelly
